strong.span: STAY HOME. STOP THE SPREAD. SAVE LIVES.

p.br:
At the order of NEW YORK STATE GOVERNOR ANDREW CUOMO, all schools in NEW YORK have been ORDERED to close UNTIL MAY 15th. please monitor the district website frequently for updates.
Grades K-5 Extended Distance Learning Packets Can be Accessed Here.
For Online Kindergarten Registration, Please visit this link.

div.div: View the latest information from Comsewogue regarding the Coronavirus outbreak. Included are helpful resources and links, categorized updates and more.
Information regarding Extended Distance Learning at Comsewogue is available for our students and parents.

a.title: Learn more about Extended Distance Learning Information

p.span:
There is a testing site for Coronavirus at SUNY Stony Brook University in South P Lot. Only those experiencing symptoms of Coronavirus will be tested. Call 1-888-364-2065 if you feel you have contracted the virus. No doctor's referrals are necessary.
There is rapid COVID-19 testing available at three locations on Long Island. Learn more by reading this article.

div.p: At Comsewogue we strive to foster a positive learning environment. Our number one priority is to help the children of our community succeed. We want to connect with each and every student and hope that they become engaged in their education. Above everything else, we want to empower our children to achieve their goals and be proud to be part of the Comsewogue School District.

Comsewogue School District is excited to be officially Middle States accredited with no stipulations or recommendations! This multi-year process was truly a collaborative effort. Thank you to everyone in our amazing community and district who contributed.

img.title: Megaphone
img.p: Take a look at what's coming up this week throughout Comsewogue School District. Don't forget to check out the rest of our website, our calendars and our Social Media accounts for more events, happenings and information!

div.div: Please view the latest information from Comsewogue School District regarding the COVID-19 (Coronavirus) outbreak.

a.title: Connect with Comsewogue on Social Media

img.alt: Connect with Comsewogue on Social Media

div.div: Connect with Comsewogue on Social Media
Comsewogue School District is on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter. Give us a follow today for updates, pictures and more!
More Info About Connect with Comsewogue on Social Media

div.p: Comsewogue School District is on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter! Give us a follow today for reminders about important events and happenings throughout the District and community.
Stay connected with Comsewogue! See how you can receive notifications via our mobile app, connect-ed phone calls and more by visiting this page.
Download the Comsewogue School District Mobile App today and receive important notifications, lunch menus, bus routes, calendar events and more right at your fingertips.

div.p: We've developed a series of questions and answers based around popular elements on our websites. Check out our Website FAQ for more details! If you still have a question after reading, feel free to send us an email.
